name: mptrel
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: relopabi(s0, hs0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
stmt.pretty: relopabi(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

|- wrel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffss(hs0, s0)

|- wrel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

comment: The maps-to notation always describes a relationship. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)
